summary: A schoolteacher in a rural community campaigns to stop the practice of older men marrying underage girls.
cast: Shirley Mills|Bob Bollinger|Warner Richmond|Diana Durrell|Dorothy Carrol|George Humphreys|Frank Martin|George Morrell|Angelo Rossitto|Al Bannon
keywords: ozark mountains|child bride|murder by gunshot|bootlegger|young love
director: Director: Harry Revier (as Harry J. Revier)
title: Child Bride
